name: Cherish Baby Care Baby Toothbrush & Toddler Toothbrush Set (0-2 Years) - BPA-Free & Safety-Tested, 2023 Award Winner, Food-Grade Silicone (Teal)
short_description: Award-winning baby toothbrush kit - Cover your little one’s dental care needs from 3 to 24 months with one kit! Looking after your baby’s teeth, tongue, and gums is quick and easy with our high-quality 3-pack (baby finger brush, silicone toothbrush, toddler brush) in fun colors.

Safety-tested - Designed by fellow parents with the help of a pediatric dentist, our baby toothbrushes are made from food-grade silicone and free from Phthalates. The baby and toddler toothbrushes are super easy to sanitize and get safety-tested by a third-party lab.

3+ months - Start them off early! Use the finger brush to gently clean and massage gums or remove milk build-up on the tongue. The baby gum brush also gets your baby used to the strange sensation of brushing.

6-12 months - Gently rub this newborn toothbrush along the teeth and molar to clean and massage the top and bottom. The chewable, double-sided toothbrush head also helps soothe sore gums, making it perfect for early teethers!

12-24 months - Time to let your little one have a go! The kids toothbrush handle is just the right size and texture to be easy for little hands to hold. Our unique design is smaller than a ‘regular’ kids toothbrush and comfortably fits into a tiny baby's mouth.

SUITABLE FOR INFANTS OR TODDLERS: Our baby toothbrush finger toothbrushes is suitable for infants aged 6-36 months. The baby finger toothbrush works better with baby toothpaste or without baby toothpaste. Teach your baby healthy oral hygiene habits with the soft silicone finger tooth brushing baby finger toothbrush.

FITS MOST MOMS AND DADS: The baby finger toothbrush has a built-in non-slip clasp for a soft fit on the finger and can be bent at will, one size of the baby finger toothbrush will fit most moms and dads' fingers. Our silicone infant finger toothbrush is tight enough not to slip off slim fingers, yet flexible enough for thicker fingers. Just wet the silicone baby finger brush and the silicone will fit most finger widths.

4 BABY FINGER TOOTHBRUSHES WITH 4 STORAGE CASES. Our infant finger toothbrush set includes 4 silicone baby finger toothbrushes and 4 storage boxes. product_description: Brushing time is bonding time with Dr. Brown’s™ Silicone Finger Baby Toothbrush and Toothbrush Set! Teach baby healthy oral hygiene habits with the super-soft 100% silicone toothbrush that is gentle on sensitive mouths. Silicone bristles gently clean baby’s gums and emerging teeth - just add a pea-sized drop of toothpaste to the toothbrush and use small circular motions to clean. Dr. Brown’s™ Fluoride-Free Strawberry Baby Toothpaste safely and effectively cleans with no fluoride, artificial flavors, or colors – and it’s safe to swallow! This dual-sided toothbrush features a textured surface that massages the inside of baby’s cheeks and gums to relieve teething soreness. The silicone finger toothbrush fits comfortably over an adult finger and is easy to slip on. The included storage case is great for travel and protects the toothbrush when not in use. The toothbrush can also be used without toothpaste – simply wet with water before brushing teeth and gums. Always use with adult supervision. BPA free. Includes: 2 – finger toothbrushes (3m+), 1 – storage case, 1 – toothpaste, 1.4oz/40g (0-3y). Wash toothbrush prior to each use. Safe for use in dishwasher (top rack only), electric and microwave sterilizers or boiling water. Keep toothpaste away from dogs.
